attributes.title: eww
attributes.review: I open up this app and am greeted with what looks to be Chester the cheetahs ugly uncle, he thinks he is cute, but he is not 🙀 I looked a bit more and saw his hair literally fly off disgusting. And this is supposed to be our president? 😾😾😾👹

attributes.title: Review
attributes.review: This app is horrible it lead me to fake news websites and it turned my cat into satan I would not recommend getting this app unless you want to make a deal with the devil

attributes.title: no💕
attributes.review: sis looks like a prison bus mixed w pickle rick🙈 but anyways- this app is terrible! i decided to download it to see when the next rally is to prank him again- i mean to show up actually. lol sorry trumpet! i had to walk to pet worm after i bought tickets. maybe next time❤️ (no) it’s racist, just like him, and is disgusting. i demand it’s deleted off the app. gen z is better than u trumpet<3 sincerely- alt gen z tiktoker🙈🥰🧚🏼‍♀️💕

attributes.title: Took away my melonin
attributes.review: This app quite literally white washed me. Each second on the app I could feel color leaving my skin, at which point privilege began pouring from my pours.

attributes.title: Absolutely the WORST APP EVER.
attributes.review:
As I began to download the app my phone started to glitch. It hasn’t ever done this prior.  Followed by when I saw the image of satan my screen began to crack uncontrollably. I had to buy a new phone!!! This is an Outrage!!!! 

-Karen

attributes.title: Please help
attributes.review: this app actually broke into me and my friend’s houses, stole our pride flags, called us slurs and then put trump bumper stickers on our cars. i’m very scared of what this app will do next, apple please remove this for our safety 😭😔

attributes.title: Horrifying. Sad. And tragic
attributes.review: Opened this app and was completely startled by this big orange Cheeto lookin man. Found out they actually let him be in charge of an entire country. Turns out he’s not very good at it either://

attributes.title: get rid of this app 2020 🧚🏻‍♀️✨

attributes.title: Gen- Z don’t go down without a fight
